channel.title: QuickBooks Small Business Podcast
channel.description: Tips to help your small business survive and thrive from the makers of QuickBooks. In each brief episode, we interview a small business expert for guidance on a particular topic. Our speakers include small business owners, accountants, and other small business specialists. You can learn about topics ranging from finding an accountant to using the internet to find customers, all in the time it takes to drink a cup of coffee.
channel.itunes:subtitle: QuickBooks Small Business Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Tips to help your small business survive and thrive from the makers of QuickBooks. In each brief episode, we interview a small business expert for guidance on a particular topic. Our speakers include small business owners, accountants, and other small business specialists. You can learn about topics ranging from finding an accountant to using the internet to find customers, all in the time it takes to drink a cup of coffee.
channel.itunes:author: Intuit

item.title: Hiring Your First Employee
item.description: LThinking about hiring your first employee? QuickBooks Pro Advisor Renee Mengali helps you navigate the less obvious aspects of the process. Ms. Mengali has 15 years’ experience working with small business clients. Visit her firm’s website at www.mengali.com.
item.itunes:subtitle: Hiring Your First Employee
item.itunes:summary: Thinking about hiring your first employee? QuickBooks Pro Advisor Renee Mengali helps you navigate the less obvious aspects of the process. Ms. Mengali has 15 years’ experience working with small business clients. Visit her firm’s website at www.mengali.com.
item.itunes:author: Intuit
item.itunes:keywords: Small Business, Intuit, Small Business, Accountant

item.title: Help us help you…
item.description: Leave us feedback! We’ll be giving away some great thank-you gifts to the first 20 people to take our survey. Listen to this brief episode for details.
item.itunes:subtitle: Help us help you: Please leave us feedback!
item.itunes:summary: Leave us feedback! We’ll be giving away some great thank-you gifts to the first 20 people to take our survey. Listen to this brief episode for details.

item.itunes:keywords: Small Business, Intuit, Small Business, Accountant

item.title: Getting Paid, Part 2
item.description: Collect the money you earned from your customers: QuickBooks ProAdvisor Lisa McCarthy gives tips on collecting payment from customers who are behind. Ms. McCarthy has 15 years’ experience working with over 600 small business clients across the nation. Visit her firm’s website at www.acctres.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Getting Paid (Part 1): Improve your cash flow by getting paid quickly
item.itunes:summary: Collect the money you earned from your customers: QuickBooks ProAdvisor Lisa McCarthy gives tips on collecting payment from customers who are behind. item.title: Getting Paid (Part 1): Improve your cash flow by getting paid quickly
item.description: Improve your cash flow and prevent collection problems before they start by getting prompt payments from your customers. Our guest, QuickBooks ProAdvisor Lisa McCarthy, has 15 years’ experience working with over 600 small business clients across the nation. Visit her firm’s website at www.acctres.com.

item.title: A Lawyers' Perspective
item.description: We interview small business lawyer, consultant, and author Cliff Ennico, who talks about some of the common concerns new businesses face - can my business idea succeed? How will I find customers? How much should I worry about getting sued?
item.itunes:subtitle: A Lawyers' Perspective
item.itunes:summary: We interview small business lawyer, consultant, and author Cliff Ennico, who talks about some of the common concerns new businesses face - can my business idea succeed? How will I find customers? How much should I worry about getting sued?
item.itunes:author: Intuit
item.itunes:keywords: Small Business Law, Small Business Legal, Small Business, Accountant, Finding Customers, Legal Issues

item.title: Online Marketing for Your Business
item.description: Scott Wilder draws on his experiences at internet start-ups, Intuit, and his own small businesses to talk about how small businesses can take advantage of the internet and online marketing to get customers.
item.itunes:subtitle: Online Marketing for Your Business
item.itunes:summary: Scott Wilder draws on his experiences at internet start-ups, Intuit, and his own small businesses to talk about how small businesses can take advantage of the internet and online marketing to get customers.
item.itunes:author: Intuit
item.itunes:keywords: Online Marketing, BLOG, Small Business BLOG, Small Business, Accountant, Online Advertisement,Finding Customers

item.title: Finding an Accountant
item.description: QuickBooks Community guru and former small business owner Scott Wilder talks about how small businesses can find an accountant that suits their needs. The opinions expressed on this podcast are those of the speakers, not necessarily those of Intuit.
item.itunes:subtitle: Finding an Accountant

item.itunes:keywords: Finding an Accountant, Small Business, Accountant
